column4: so i need to boot from usb flash memory. i'm reading https://help.ubuntu.com/community/Installation/FromCForUSBStick but my problem is that it's now asking me to copy some files onto it from my system, and i'm not running ubuntu. is it reasonable to expect /boot/grub to be compatible between Debian 4.0 and Ubuntu?
(boot as in boot the installer)
if you are booting from usb you likely wont use grub but instead syslinux
